alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:38AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meriwether and southern Troup Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 438 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Long Cane, or near Lanett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Pine Mountain, Mountville, Cannonville, Odessadale, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Durand, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Long Cane and Jones Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
